translations.english: He also asked: "Does Yue Yi have descendants?"

translations.chinese: 得其孫叔，封之樂鄉，號華成君。
translations.english: He obtained his grandson Shu and enfeoffed him at Yuexiang, titled Lord Huacheng.
He questioned Xi's generals. They were all former merchants.
The emperor said: "I know how to deal with them."

translations.chinese: 乃多以金購豨將，豨將多降。
translations.english: So he used much gold to buy Xi's generals. Xi's generals mostly surrendered.
